full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## EXFO Products or Equivalent
### Solicitation Number: BPM018576/22379
### Publication Date: 2023-03-20
### Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-30T15:00:00

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of EXFO software and hardware that will support the deployment of Ciena Optical Networking solutions, as well as day-to-day maintenance activities.

### Classification
- UNSPSC Code: None
- NIBS Classification: *LOCAL AREA NETWORKS, SYSTEMS AND COMPONENTS, ADP Support Equipment

### Contract Details
- Contract Category: Goods and Services
- Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
- Selection Criteria: None
- Limited Tendering Reason: None

### Trade Agreements
- The solicitation is open to suppliers from countries participating in the following Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Geographical Scope
- The contract is intended for use in Canada and worldwide.

### Contact Information
- Contact Person: Oliver Librada
- Contact Email: [oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- Contact Phone: 343-542-8460
- Contact Fax: 343-542-8460

### Document Attachments
- The tender documents are available for download at the following links: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/68625A54-2EE5-4383-AC17-C33AEEBA2BE3, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/1CF76528-CA0F-4D32-A34C-D735F0632851, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/8D064C59-CFA3-4E93-ABA
